text: Yang Xiaobo (January 1963 â€“ January 2020) was a Chinese politician. From 2009 until December 2014, he served as mayor of Huangshi. He was born in Tianmen, Hubei. In January 2020, Yang died of pneumonia caused by the novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) in Hubei at the age of 56 or 57. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in China Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:Chinese mayors Category:Politicians from Hubei Category:21st-century Chinese politicians
title: Yang Xiaobo (Hubei politician)
